metadata.title: Shiny for Python – What’s for dinner?
metadata.description: Use the dinner-recipe template as a foundation for your next Shiny app.

content.text: A fun and useful way explore a dinner (or other meal) recipes based on the information provided. In addition to guiding you towards a recipe idea, it also provides buttons to: (1) extract the recipe information in a structured format and (2) restart the chat session. By wrapping the chat in a card() component, the card footer offers a natural place to include these “bespoke” UI controls. This, plus leaning into shinyswatch for custom theming, helps the app feel more polished without much extra effort.
